reactor.netty.http.client

Class HttpClientConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.netty.transport.TransportConfig
      • reactor.netty.transport.ClientTransportConfig<HttpClientConfig>
        • reactor.netty.http.client.HttpClientConfig

  • public final class HttpClientConfig
extends ClientTransportConfig<HttpClientConfig>
    Encapsulate all necessary configuration for HTTP client transport. The public API is read-only.
    Author:
    Stephane Maldini, Violeta Georgieva

      Return the configured HTTP response decoder options or the default.

      Provides a global AddressResolverGroup from HttpResources that is shared amongst all HTTP clients.

      Return the configured default ConnectionObserver.

      Return the default LoggingHandler to wiretap this transport.

      Return the default LoopResources for this transport.

      Return the configured metrics recorder.

      Return the default callback if any or ChannelPipelineConfigurer.emptyConfigurer().

      Return the configured follow redirect predicate or null.

      Return the configured request uri.
